reviews.text: Bottle. Pours with a nice billowy head which collapses into a dirty yellow colour. Hint of citrus flavour, slightly spicy and a heavy "fremented" taste to it. Overall, not too bad, but not one Iâll rush out to buy again.

Bottle courtesy of geth_in_beer.  Many thanks.  Deep brown beer with rich garnet highlights.  The aroma is quite nice, light cocoa and a soft coffeeish aroma on the nose.  Some light roast and a touch of tartness.  Very light-bodied.  OK, but not great.
Bottle - Boozy, honey, herbal and spice. Hazy orange with no head. Very sweet syrupy, spices and booze. A sweet syrupy mess.
